body.p: The __________ is on the medial side of the lower leg and the __________ is on the medial side of the forearm.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The ulna is on the medial side of the forearm, the radius is on the lateral side of the forearm.
Correct. The tibia is on the medial side of the leg and the ulna is on the medial side of the forearm.
Incorrect. The tibia is on the medial side of the leg and the fibula is on the lateral side of the leg.
Incorrect. The fibula is on the lateral side of the leg and the radius is on the lateral side of the forearm.
